revision.text:
<!--강_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = River
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 다른이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 별명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:nick }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 나라 | ontologyProperty = country }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 지방 | ontologyProperty = region }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 도시 | ontologyProperty = city }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 왼쪽지류 | ontologyProperty = leftTributary }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 오른쪽지류 | ontologyProperty = rightTributary }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 발원지 | ontologyProperty = source }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 발원지나라 | ontologyProperty = sourceCountry }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 발원지지방 | ontologyProperty = sourceRegion }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 발원지위치 | ontologyProperty = sourceMountain }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 발원지위치 | ontologyProperty = sourcePlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 합류점 | ontologyProperty = sourceConfluence }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 합류점나라 | ontologyProperty = sourceConfluenceCountry }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 합류점지방 | ontologyProperty = sourceConfluenceRegion }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 합류점고도 | ontologyProperty = sourceConfluenceElevation }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 하구나라 | ontologyProperty = mouthCountry }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 하구지방 | ontologyProperty = mouthRegion }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 하구고도 | ontologyProperty = mouthElevation | unit = metre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 길이 | ontologyProperty = length | unit = kilometre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 폭 | ontologyProperty = width | unit = kilometre }}
end}}
